content.question: When Kaylee’s friends discovered she was going to have her tonsils removed, they told her she was going to be in a great deal of pain. After the surgery Kaylee reported that she was in a lot of pain, although most of her pain should have been alleviated by her pain medication. Given this scenario, which of the following best explains Kaylee’s reporting of pain?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
